mapper.select: select * from v_wxentapp t1 where wxentappid=#{id}
select * from v_wxentapp t1 where wxentappid=#{id}

mapper.sql: SELECT t1.AGENTID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APIENCODINGAESKEY, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.APPTYPE, t1.APPURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.REPENTERFLAG, t1.REPLOCATIONFLAG, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t11.WXACCOUNTNAME, t1.WXENTAPPID, t1.WXENTAPPNAME FROM T_SRFWXENTAPP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWXACCOUNT t11 ON t1.WXACCOUNTID = t11.WXACCOUNTID

SELECT t1.`AGENTID`, t1.`APIAPPSECRET`, t1.`APIENCODINGAESKEY`, t1.`APITOKEN`, t1.`APIURL`, t1.`APPTYPE`, t1.`APPURL`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`REPENTERFLAG`, t1.`REPLOCATIONFLAG`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`WXACCOUNTID`, t11.`WXACCOUNTNAME`, t1.`WXENTAPPID`, t1.`WXENTAPPNAME` FROM `T_SRFWXENTAPP` t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWXACCOUNT t11 ON t1.WXACCOUNTID = t11.WXACCOUNTID

SELECT t1.AGENTID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APIENCODINGAESKEY, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.APPTYPE, t1.APPURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.REPENTERFLAG, t1.REPLOCATIONFLAG, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t11.WXACCOUNTNAME, t1.WXENTAPPID, t1.WXENTAPPNAME FROM T_SRFWXENTAPP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWXACCOUNT t11 ON t1.WXACCOUNTID = t11.WXACCOUNTID

SELECT t1.AGENTID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APIENCODINGAESKEY, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.APPTYPE, t1.APPURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.REPENTERFLAG, t1.REPLOCATIONFLAG, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t11.WXACCOUNTNAME, t1.WXENTAPPID, t1.WXENTAPPNAME FROM T_SRFWXENTAPP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWXACCOUNT t11 ON t1.WXACCOUNTID = t11.WXACCOUNTID

SELECT t1.AGENTID, t1.APIAPPSECRET, t1.APIENCODINGAESKEY, t1.APITOKEN, t1.APIURL, t1.APPTYPE, t1.APPURL, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.REPENTERFLAG, t1.REPLOCATIONFLAG, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.VALIDFLAG, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t11.WXACCOUNTNAME, t1.WXENTAPPID, t1.WXENTAPPNAME FROM T_SRFWXENTAPP t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWXACCOUNT t11 ON t1.WXACCOUNTID = t11.WXACCOUNTID

SELECT t1.[AGENTID], t1.[APIAPPSECRET], t1.[APIENCODINGAESKEY], t1.[APITOKEN], t1.[APIURL], t1.[APPTYPE], t1.[APPURL], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[REPENTERFLAG], t1.[REPLOCATIONFLAG], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[VALIDFLAG], t1.[WXACCOUNTID], t11.[WXACCOUNTNAME], t1.[WXENTAPPID], t1.[WXENTAPPNAME] FROM [T_SRFWXENTAPP] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWXACCOUNT t11 ON t1.WXACCOUNTID = t11.WXACCOUNTID
